class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolGroup
class.query: select g from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolGroup g where g.name = :name
class.sql-query: select gcp.group_id as group_id, count(gcp.cp_id) as cp_count from os_cp_group_cps gcp inner join catissue_collection_protocol cp on cp.identifier = gcp.cp_id where gcp.group_id in :groupIds and cp.activity_status != 'Disabled' group by gcp.group_id

select fc.cp_id as cpId, fc.container_id as formId from catissue_form_context fc inner join dyextn_containers f on f.identifier = fc.container_id where fc.deleted_on is null and f.deleted_on is null and (fc.cp_id = -1 or fc.cp_id in :cpIds) and fc.entity_type = :entityType
